item.title: Cloudwatch Custom Metrics With CloudWatch Embedded Metric Format
item.description: Introduction Cloudwatch is an integral part of the AWS ecosystem. Every service in AWS reports to cloudwatch for the service logs, application logs, metrics, etc. In this article let’s discuss the cloudwatch custom metrics in detail. Metrics help us with finding the performance of the AWS services and the applications we run using these services. It also allows us to visualize the data with graphs and dashboards and create alarms based on the data reported tho metrics.
